Title: Great victory -- Great military parade to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Chinese people's struggle against Japan
Notes: On 3 September 2015, the China Victory Day parade, a military parade along Chang'an Avenue, Beijing, was held to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the Victory over Japan Day, formally ending World War II.
Theme: 70th Anniversary of the Victory over Japan Day (2015)The Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)Xi Jinping
